Deputy.definition: -ties [Middle French deputé person appointed to exercise authority
Deputy.origin: [Middle French deputé person appointed to exercise authority, from past participle of deputer to appoint, depute]

-ties.definition: [Middle Frenchperson appointed to exercise authority, from past participle ofto appoint, depute]

1.definition: a person appointed as a substitute with power to act

2.definition: a second in command or assistant who usually takes charge when his or her superior is absent
